***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [pətĩː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
पतिं • (patiṃ) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐥𑐟𑐶𑑄)
   1. finger
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * patiṃ (Latin script)
    * 𑀧𑀢𑀺𑀁 (Brahmi script)
    * পতিং (Bengali script)
    * පතිං (Sinhalese script)
    * ပတိံ or ပတီ (Burmese script)
    * ปติํ or ปะติง (Thai script)
    * ᨷᨲᩥᩴ (Tai Tham script)
    * ປຕິໍ or ປະຕິງ (Lao script)
    * បតិំ (Khmer script)
    * 𑄛𑄖𑄨𑄁 (Chakma script)
**** Noun[edit] ****
पतिं (patiṃ)
   1. Devanagari_script form of patiṃ, which is accusative singular of पति
      (pati, “boss”)
**** Verb[edit] ****
पतिं (patiṃ)
   1. Devanagari_script form of patiṃ, which is first-person singular aorist
      active of पतति (patati, “to fall”)
